channel.title: Bows
channel.description: hey, i added some bows to my server that used to have to be upclose to attack, i didnt know exactly where to fix that so in the client i posted em where ever the dark bow id was until i got it, only problem now is non of the bows use arrows. even dark bow no longer uses arrows and all i hit is 0s, how do i make it so it uses arrows again?

item.title: Bows
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
